    • Method Detail

      • loadConditionFile

        public boolean loadConditionFile(java.lang.String conditionFile,
                        ConstraintType constraintType)
        Read a file containing the description of the conditions. All the constraints must belong to the same type : binary, double or integer
        Parameters:
        conditionFile - : This must a tabulated network giving the state of each actor (0,1) in each condition: 1st column : the name of the condition 2nd column : the code of the condition following columns : the state of the actors (their names are in the header)
        constraintType - : ConstraintType : type of the variables
        entities - : ArrayList of String. Will be filled during the process : these are the entities found in the condition file
        Returns:
        false if there is a problem while reading the file
